# Gas and Opcodes
[Opcode Tool](https://etherscan.io/opcode-tool)

open 3 consoles  
1. `testrpc`
2. `truffle migrate && truffle console`
3. `geth attach`

What is deployed to the blockchain?  
in the truffle console
```js
Greetings.binary
''
```

or in the geth console
```js
eth.getTransaction('0x9e68f0e2d6fb8a696752c062e79e8b9bd4532f25c4e35241fe3a98e49beb94ef').input  // the 3rd transaction
""
```
this binary bytecode is what actually added to the blockchain
